MWC.GUI.Properties

Class WorldAccelerationPropertyEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.beans.PropertyEditorSupport
      • MWC.GUI.Properties.WorldAccelerationPropertyEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyEditor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingWorldAccelerationPropertyEditor

    public abstract class WorldAccelerationPropertyEditor
extends java.beans.PropertyEditorSupport
    abstract class providing core functionality necessary for editing a distance value where units are provided (the return value is in minutes)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.text.DecimalFormat _formatter
      the formatting object used to write to screen
      protected int _numColumns
      the amount of columns the users wants us to create
